page.title: 12ACTIVITIES - CHURCH HALL (1)
page.content: The{Judo Club}started in July 1984 and all its members were beginners. A year later it has 25 junior and 7 senior members, 7 of whom have gained their yellow belts. The club meets every Friday evening, and with village support, hopes to hold a fund raising Fete in August 1985. The{Parish Council}meets on the second Monday of each month. There are 6 elected members, and a Clerk in attendance. The members elect a Chairman and Vice-Chairman, and the Council serves for 4 years. In February 1985 there were 596 adults eligible to vote in the Parish. The{Womens' Institute}meets monthly on the fourth Tuesday and has 46 members. They celebrated their 50th anniversary in 1984. In May 1985 they performed a play which raised Â£132 for the MacMillan Nurses Appeal.
